message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you. I'm asking for $20,000 to start negotiations.
I'm interested in the product, but $20,000 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000, which is the maximum I'm willing to pay.
I understand your perspective, Bob, but $20,000 is closer to the product's true value. How about we meet in the middle at $17,000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but $17,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $14,000 for the product. Can we meet somewhere in between?
